objects.text:
• Premium Apple Device Trinity
• Seamless Ecosystem Integration
• iCloud Synchronization Across Devices

product_details.name: Complete Apple Ecosystem Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Premium Apple Device Trinity: MacBook Pro, iPad, and iPhone in pristine condition
• MacBook Pro featuring Retina Display and backlit keyboard for ultimate productivity
• Seamless ecosystem integration across all three devices
• Latest iOS and macOS compatibility for smooth cross-device functionality
• High-performance MacBook Pro with Force Touch trackpad
• Stunning iPad display perfect for creative work and entertainment
• Sleek iPhone design with Touch ID functionality
• iCloud synchronization capability across all devices
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and Apple enthusiasts
• All devices in Silver/White color scheme for elegant aesthetics
• Handoff feature enables seamless workflow between devices
• Universal Clipboard for effortless content sharing
• AirDrop capability for quick file transfers between devices

banner_details:
This banner is split into two distinct halves: a dark left section featuring promotional content, and a clean, light right section displaying a trio of Apple devices. The left panel includes text elements such as a prominent bold heading (`heading_1`) followed by an eye-catching accent heading (`heading_2`), a sleek subheading (`subheading`), and a descriptive bullet list (`description`) that highlights product features. Further down, a call-to-action (`cta`) rests within a vibrantly colored button (`cta_button`), flanked by a price tag (`price`) and discount detail (`discount`). A horizontal tagline (`tagline`) sits just above the pricing. The right half contains a large centered product image (`product_image`). The background boasts subtle circles and a dividing line, enhancing visual harmony.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #0a2647
- Sky Blue: #2c74b3 (used in translucent circular overlays)
- Coral Red: #ff6b6b
- Peach Accent: #ff9e7d
- Light Gray: #e0e0e0
- Off White: #f5f5f7
- Pure White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases sleek Apple devices with a balanced, modern color palette perfect for a premium advertisement banner. Dominant tones include metallic silver-gray (#A2A2A2) for the devices' bodies, combined with glossy black (#1C1C1C) from the keyboards and screens. The laptop screen features a stunning natural background, blending soft lavender-pink (#D8A1D1), warm sunset orange (#F5B890), and tranquil beige (#DCC9B4), all enhanced by subtle blue skies (#A2BDE9). These colors contrast beautifully against the minimalist silver aesthetic, highlighting screen vibrancy. For a banner, a palette combining these tones suggests sophistication and clarity, blending modern tech elegance with vivid, calming visuals.
